headline: Scrumconnect expands Workday partnership to include implementation services
summary: Scrumconnect, the award-winning digital transformation company, today announced it has signed a partnership agreement with Workday, a leading provider of solutions to help organizations manage their people and money. This agreement expands Scrumconnect's existing Workday Application Management Services partnership, announced in 2025, to include full Workday implementation services. Together, the two partnerships allow Scrumconnect to support organisations across the full Workday lifecycle, from

content.title: Scrumconnect expands Workday partnership to include implementation services
content.summary: Scrumconnect, the award-winning digital transformation company, today announced it has signed a partnership agreement with Workday, a leading provider of solutions to help organizations manage their people and money. This agreement expands Scrumconnect's existing Workday Application Management Services partnership, announced in 2025, to include full Workday implementation services.
